features: Create Wonder: Inspire your little ones imagination and creativity with this cute wooden wall art for kids. Great for themed playrooms and nurseries such as safari, woodland, jungle, animal or boho. Suitable for boys or girls playrooms.
Easy Installation: The pieces come with adhesive already applied for convenient installation. No special tools or skills are required, saving you time and frustration

Versatility: This sign comes in 9 individual pieces, giving you the freedom to be creative and decorate as you see fit to match into the rest of your kids playroom decor or kids bedroom decor. Refer to the infographic image for full product dimensions

High-Quality Materials: Laser cut from 1/8 inch thick plywood this play sign has a natural rustic wood color finish which will match any nursery wall decor. It maintains the balance between durability and being lightweight for easy hanging

Thoughtful Gift: Looking for a unique gift for friends, family or colleagues? This playroom sign will enhance any playroom decor from your home to a daycare center, classroom or even a pediatric office. This kids wall art will leave a lasting impression and will be cherished by both adults and children

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brighten Up That Blank Space Is your playroom wall bare and lacking inspiration? Spice up that blank space with this fun wooden wall sign with the phrase "Where the Wild Ones Play". A great addition to any playroom but particularly animal and jungle themed rooms. Let Your Kids Get Wild There's a time and a place for your kids to go wild and the playroom at playtime is one of them! This sign helps to reinforce the idea that playtime can be a time to loosen up and act a little crazy. Your kids will get even more enjoyment out of your playroom with the addition of this wall sign. Looking For An Outside Of The Box Gift? The time before the arrival of a new baby is full of anticipation and excitement. Finding the right gift for a friend or family member can be difficult, so if you're looking for a unique gift that is going to leave a lasting impression, don't go past this cute rustic wooden wall sign. The LITTLE SNUGGLEBUGS Journey A mother of two, some unforeseen events forced me to be unable to work a typical 9-5 job. I love being creative and in particular decorating my little ones bedrooms. I started this business working at night looking to make fun and practical decorations and I hope your family gets as much enjoyment out of them as mine does.

Freedom To Choose The sign comes in individual pieces allowing you arrange the letters as you see fit. Horizontal, vertical, diagonal or anything in between. The choice is yours. Pre-applied Adhesive The product comes with adhesive already applied to the individual pieces. After cleaning and preparing your desired wall area, simply peel off the protective backing and apply straight to the wall. Made With Precision Laser cut from 1/8 thick plywood by skilled craftsmen, the sign has very crisp edges which makes the sign pop once hanging on your wall. This is sure to be a eye catching display. Rustic Feel The natural wood color gives the sign a rustic feel. This works great for rooms with a neutral color scheme or if you're looking for a more natural ambience. If you're planning a jungle or animal themed room this will fit right in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the color of this wood! Has been sticking up on the wall since we put it up a month ago, no issues with that even after I have to remove a few pieces to align it during placement!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tasteful and well made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy unfortunately
reviews.reviewText: This is a very cute item but unfortunately the adhesive on back is very weak and they fall off and break in under 24 hours. Should have listened to reviews!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super cute but doesn’t stay on the wall had to use hot glue ! Would be better on a flat photo frame

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best by far!
reviews.reviewText: I am impressed by this! I’m usually not but this is a great buy for our son’s nursery. The craftsmanship is amazing and the size fits our needs. Would definitely recommend 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.reviewText: Love this! It's very fitting for my little ones and looks amazing! I love how it sticks to the wall. Even better, it's super affordable compared to other places I was looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put up, looks great
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our toddler's playroom. It was really easy to put up, thr adhesive so far has been sufficiently strong, and the letters are pretty thin so they lay nicely against the wall. My wife had been wanting something like this and she's thrilled with how this looks on the wall. It really looks great and the letters have a nice finish/ look to them. Plus they're reasonably priced.For full transparency I received this item for free as part of the Amazon Vine review program. This is my honest review and is not affected by my membership in this. Overall, this item is one I WOULD consider buying myself if I had not received it through this program.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are extremely fragile and do not stick. Upset with the product because it’s so cute and it won’t stay on the wall.Update: DAY 3 and the entire word WILD has fallen off the wall. received refund, thank you!
